definition: to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm
to tremble/to shiver/to shake/to vibrate/Taiwan pr. [zhan4]

sentences.english: His gin is also an audacious animal, odd and thrilling.
sentences.chinese: 他的杜松子酒也是一個大膽的產物，奇怪且令人驚顫。

sentences.english: Police rushed the bus, trying frantically to break through the windows with sledge hammers.
sentences.chinese: 驚顫衝進巴士，試圖用錘子打破車窗。
